jobDescription: HIRING AN EXPERIENCED MAINTENANCE TECHNICIAN  First class apartment community in Arlington / Clarendon area, has opening for an experienced, dependable, and hard-working Maintenance Technician. Successful applicant will have knowledge of:  * Preparation of apartments for turnover Good plumbing skillsGeneral knowledge of apartment maintenanceGrounds maintenanceCompleting maintenance service requests.Self starter with the ability to work independentlyAttention to detailMust have own tools Ability to be a good team player and communicate effectively always with a positive, highly motivated attitude. Willingness to take direction,and always be at work on time. References required. Company offers excellent benefits. Must be able to pass drug test. Please email resume to michelle@bartonhouse.com or fax resume to (703) 525-0449.
